item.title: Install GTK4 on Windows
item.author: Author
item.description: {.gtk .gtkalign-center} Install GTK4 on Windows11::: contents ::: This is a guide to install and config GTK4 on Windows 11. :::: note ::: title Note ::: All steps have been tested in Sandbox: Edition Windows 11 Enterprise Version 22H2 OS build 22621.1848 :::: :::: hint ::: title Hint ::: GTK official guide :::: 1. Download and install Msys2This tutorial uses the default installation path, if you use a custom one, you need to pay attention when setting PATH later
